001package squidpony.examples.snowman;
002
003/**
004 * This class represents some item of treasure found in the game.
005 *
006 * @author Eben Howard
007 */
008public class Treasure {
009
010    private final String name;
011    private final int value;
012
013    /**
014     * Creates a treasure with the provided name and value.
015     *
016     * @param name
017     * @param value
018     */
019    public Treasure(String name, int value) {
020        this.name = name;
021        this.value = value;
022    }
023
024    public String getName() {
025        return name;
026    }
027
028    public int getValue() {
029        return value;
030    }
031
032}
